metadata.title: About Us | Music Manager
metadata.description: Learn more about Music Manager - Your platform for connecting musicians and managing music opportunities.

hero.title: About Music Manager
hero.subtitle: Connecting musicians with opportunities and helping them manage their musical journey

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Music Manager was created with a simple yet powerful vision: to make it easier for musicians to find and manage their opportunities. We believe that every musician deserves access to the tools and connections they need to succeed in their musical journey.

band.title: Band Management
band.description: Create and manage your band profile, connect with other musicians, and showcase your music to potential opportunities.

booking.title: Booking System
booking.description: Streamline your booking process with our integrated calendar and communication tools.

offers.title: Offer Management
offers.description: Create and manage performance offers, handle negotiations, and keep track of all your opportunities in one place.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Join our community of musicians and start managing your musical journey today.
